Name: Rocko's Quest
About the game: Within each world, Rocko will be presented with such obstacles as moving platforms, bottomless pits, flame geysers and a variety of environmental hazards. In true platformer fashion, Rocko will need to surmount these impediments by jumping, climbing and swinging his way to safety. Features: Lots of huge levels to explore, each with numerous sub-levels Bows and arrows, swords, spiked maces, and enemy weapons, can be used to defeat all who stand in your way Jump onto moving platforms, grab onto ledges, operate levers, shimmy up and down ropes and bowl over obstacles to help rocko in his quest Torches can be used to light your path, they can also be thrown ahead of you to illuminate the way
Meta Title: Rocko's Quest: Apr 24, 2014, Revistronic and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rocko's Quest? Check out the release date (Apr 24, 2014), developer insights from Revistronic, and a complete game summary.
